content.en: Neural Animation: Researchers have been exploring how artificial neural networks can be used to create more realistic and practical character animation. They have also been investigating the use of multi-level techniques for fast character adaptation in interactive environments. Additionally, algorithms have been developed to utilize motion capture data and statistical models to generate lifelike motion in virtual environments.
content.da: Neural Animation: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan kunstige neurale netværk kan bruges til at skabe mere realistisk og praktisk karakteranimation. De har også undersøgt brugen af fler-niveaute teknikker til hurtig karaktertilpasning i interaktive miljøer. Derudover er algoritmer blevet udviklet til at udnytte motion capture-data og statistiske modeller til at generere livagtig bevægelse i virtuelle miljøer.
